project.name: jaxb
project.description:
JAXB-RI Master Project
This project is organized into multiple sub-projects. Each sub-project is responsible for building itself. The build files are setup such that you can build the sub- projects independently or all together.
For example, building the runtime sub-project causes all of runtime sources in jaxb-ri/runtime/src to be compiled into jaxb-ri/runtime/build/classes.
To build the entire project, simply run 'ant' in the jaxb-ri directory. To build a sub-project, simply cd into the directory and run 'ant'.
To create a distribution of the entire project, simply run 'ant dist' in the jaxb-ri directory.
Use parse-ipr (http://parse-ipr.dev.java.net/) to set up the classpath for debugging.
